extracted_playbook.title: Update to UNEM R16B PC4 or R15B PC5
extracted_playbook.description: Update to UNEM R16B PC4 or R15B PC5 as no remediation will be available for EOL versions.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to UNEM R16B PC4
extracted_playbook.description: Update to UNEM R16B PC4 to fix vulnerabilities in UNEM R16B PC2.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to UNEM R15B PC5
extracted_playbook.description: Update to UNEM R15B PC5 (under development) to mitigate vulnerabilities in UNEM R15B PC4.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply General Mitigation Factors
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended security practices and firewall configurations to protect the process control network from external attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Deny nemadm Account for SSH Logins
extracted_playbook.description: Configure DenyUsers in /etc/ssh/sshd_config to deny nemadm account for SSH logins.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Recommended Security Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended security practices to protect process control systems from unauthorized access and external threats.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs, ensuring they are updated to the latest version.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment before deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to resources on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity to CISA
extracted_playbook.description: Follow internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

cve_id: Multiple Vulnerabilities in Hitachi Energy's UNEM
